Hero.title: Shinwa Corporation
Hero.description: Shinwa Corporation is a newly established company in Japan, founded on the principles of trust and harmony. We are committed to creating long-term value for our clients through diversified business operations. With an international perspective and cross-cultural communication strengths, Shinwa Corporation actively engages in four core business areas: IT consulting and software development, medical coordination, real estate, and international trade. Backed by extensive experience and a professional team, we always place our clients‚Äô trust as our top priority and consistently deliver high-quality, reliable solutions.
